entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 p.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
